name: The Bowery Ballroom
description: Historic venue with excellent acoustics and intimate atmosphere. Known for hosting breakthrough indie acts and established artists alike.

name: Mercury Lounge
description: Legendary small venue that launched many careers. Perfect for emerging bands looking to build their following.

name: Brooklyn Bowl
description: Unique venue combining live music with bowling. Great sound system and fun atmosphere for energetic performances.

name: Music Hall of Williamsburg
description: Modern venue with state-of-the-art sound and lighting. Popular with both emerging and established indie artists.

name: The Knitting Factory
description: Eclectic venue known for supporting experimental and avant-garde music. Great for artists pushing boundaries.

name: Rough Trade NYC
description: Record store and venue combo. Perfect for indie bands with a strong fanbase who appreciate vinyl culture.

name: Baby's All Right
description: Intimate venue with great sightlines and sound. Known for discovering new talent and hosting industry showcases.

name: The Sultan Room
description: Beautifully decorated venue specializing in world music and jazz. Perfect for acoustic acts and cultural fusion.

name: Elsewhere
description: Multi-room venue with different spaces for different vibes. Great for electronic acts and experimental music.

name: House of Yes
description: Immersive performance space known for theatrical shows and electronic music. Perfect for artists who incorporate visual elements.

name: The Bell House
description: Versatile venue in a converted warehouse. Great acoustics and flexible space for various performance styles.

name: Union Pool
description: Outdoor venue with a relaxed backyard vibe. Perfect for summer shows and bands with a laid-back aesthetic.

name: Pianos
description: Intimate venue with two performance spaces. Great for new bands looking to cut their teeth in the NYC scene.

name: Arlene's Grocery
description: Gritty rock venue with a no-frills attitude. Perfect for punk and metal bands who want an authentic NYC experience.

name: The Bitter End
description: Historic folk venue where Bob Dylan and many others got their start. Perfect for acoustic acts and singer-songwriters.

name: Joe's Pub
description: Upscale venue with dinner service. Great for sophisticated acts and artists who want a more refined atmosphere.

name: The Stone
description: Tiny venue dedicated to experimental music. Perfect for avant-garde artists and intimate acoustic performances.

name: Rockwood Music Hall
description: Multi-stage venue perfect for emerging singer-songwriters. Great place to build a following in an intimate setting.

name: The Delancey
description: Multi-level venue with rooftop space. Great for bands who want variety in their performance space.

name: Alphaville
description: DIY venue with a community focus. Perfect for emerging bands who want to connect with the underground scene.

name: Trans-Pecos
description: Experimental venue known for pushing boundaries. Great for electronic acts and experimental musicians.

name: The Gutter
description: Small punk venue with bowling lanes. Perfect for hardcore and punk bands who want an authentic underground experience.

name: Nowadays
description: Outdoor electronic music venue. Perfect for DJs and electronic acts, especially during summer months.

name: C'mon Everybody
description: Neighborhood venue with a strong community vibe. Great for bands looking to connect with local Brooklyn audiences.

name: Sunnyvale
description: Cozy venue with a backyard space. Perfect for indie bands who want an intimate, community-focused show.
